name: Wild Sea Advenures
description:
ADVENTURES UPON THE WILD SEA!

Torn from your home by mysterious forces, you have found yourself stranded in the port town of Barstow. It has taken all your effort to gather the funds for a ship- but now you have! Its time to set sail and explore this strange patch of ocean the locals call THE WILD SEA!

Can you find your way to the Beyond? Will you ever make it back home!?

FEATURES

  • Gorgeous 1-bit graphics, created in the Bitsy engine!
  • A Print-Out map, to mark your travels through the Wild Sea!
  • 2 Endings, one good and one MYSTERIOUS!

Made for the Portland Indie Game Squad summer slow jam 2021. Genre: Exploration, Theme: Lost Lands

Created with Bitsy (https://make.bitsy.org/)
